data.title: Peroxide_Princess
data.meta_description: Read stories about #frankiero, #boyxboy, and #badboy on Wattpad, recommended by Peroxide_Princess
data.text:
Suicidal

Trigger warnings: self harm, low self esteem, hatred towards self, sucidal tendencies Summary: Gerard Way, or also know as Gee, is terribly suicidal, the best? part is that no one knows. He hides behind fake smiles, fake laughter and stupid puns and jokes. This is his journal, where he documents it all.

Demolition Lovers (Frerard)

Gerard draws dicks for a living. Frank takes them. Gerard Way moves into a new apartment in a dodgy complex where he's bound to get beaten to a pulp after his old place is set on fire by those damned 'youths', and by a certain turn of events, his neighbour, the equally provocative, yet entirely in a different way, Fra...

Completed

Summertime (Frerard)

"You can run away with me, anytime you want." I want to get away. Away from the abuse at home, at school hell, but we're not friends. I could never be friends with Gerard Way. He's just some guy that fate seems to drive me towards. His brother may be even more of asshole than him, making my school life living hell and...

Completed

Flying From A Fire (Frerard)

You make think this is just another cliche story...and in some ways you're right. However, it is also so much more. Gerard Way is the new boy at another school. Living in another foster home, Gerard is thrown into a completely new life. He's quiet, smart, and a good boy. Or so everyone thinks. Everything changes whene...

Promises

Frank Iero was admitted into the Blueman Mental Hospital because of some imaginary demon he believes is following him. Gerard Way was admitted into the Blueman Mental Hospital because of severe depression, self-harm and suicidal thoughts. When they're forced to be roomates? Well promises are made, promises are kept...

Completed

There's A Boy In The Corner

Frank Iero and Gerard Way are the best of friends. They have been since they were young boys, they practically grew up together. Frank doesn't realise this, but Gerard is willing to die for him. Their popular-boy status at school comes with a lot of risks, with Frank managing to anger almost everyone in their city. Ga...

We're reckless but that's okay (Frerard) [ON HOLD]

Gerard knew he shouldn't have gone to that party. Maybe if he hadn't, his life wouldn't have turned in to the living hell it has.

Room To Grow (Frerard) (Completed)

Frank Iero hates children, with their high-pitched voices and tiny little hands. But of all of the children that irritate him, Ms. Way's kindergarten class is the worst. And of course, that's where Frank is stuck volunteering for the next two months.

Completed

Funny How It Rained All Day // Frerard

Gee, as everyone knew him, was humiliated in front of his school and felt forced to leave but two years later he's back but he's not Gee anymore. Completed: ?

You're Weird, I Like You • Frerard ✓

"We're all a little weird. And life is weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutual weirdness and call it love." -Dr. Seuss Frank's just Frank, but Gerard... he's Gerard. He's weird. Who knew one person could change Frank's life so drastically? Bea...

Completed Mature

Give Me All Your Hopeless Hearts // Frerard

Frank didn't plan on befriending anyone at school and he especially had no intention of falling in love with Gerard Way. While Frank's new friendships make a memorable year, a tragic accident truly makes high school unforgettable. Frerard // My Chemical Romance, Tonight Alive, Set It Off, PVRIS, Panic! At The Disco, P...

Completed

I Lied When I Said I Was Okay (frerard)

“I’m… I-I I’m sorry…” that’s the only thing I manage to choke out. Nobody ever caught me self harming. “You’re always so fucking sorry Gee. Save it, it doesn’t change anything.” He says and his hand wraps around my arm again. “Can I? Please?” he asks, puppy eying me again. This time, I don’t resist. I let him pull my...

Basement ➳ Petekey, Frerard

A story in which Gerard is a drug dealer criminal living in his brothers basement, Mikey is a police officer trying to prevent his brother from getting arrested, Pete is an alcoholic who Mikey keeps arresting and Frank is an annoying teenager who's sleeping with Gerard. Petekey & Frerard

High Calorie Prison

Frank honestly didn't know that getting your hand stuck in a vending machine could end up getting you laid, but the world is a strange and beautiful place.

Completed Mature

Lie To Me (Frerard)

Gerard was late, and it was fucking raining. He'd missed the bus and it was fucking raining, and he was totally going to get dropped from the play if he was late again and he was so fucking screwed, but honestly Gerard wasn't all that keen on it when he'd heard the only main part he'd managed to get in this damn theat...

Completed

Forever And Always(Frerard)

My Chemical Romance is a big hit and the band members are closer than ever. But when tragedy in its cruelest form strikes the Way brothers, it shocks all the members to their very cores. It also drudges up Gerard's dark past, and when it's revealed to Frank, Gerard fears their relationship may be in danger. Will Frank...

Completed

Stockholm Syndrome (Frerard)

The day Frank discovers Gerard is moving to the other side of the Earth and leaving him behind, something changes inside of him. His anger problems and secret attraction towards Gerard make him slowly go insane, to the point where he kidnaps Gerard to keep him all to himself. Will Gerard find a way to escape his psych...

Completed

I Would Die For You

Gerard is 17 and Frank is 15. (Not going to do a huge age gap just a tiny one) Summer time is here, Frank and Gerard have no clue what they will be doing till school starts up again. For right now they are enjoying the little things and are the meaning of their friendship or maybe there is something deeper than just a...

Endlessly, I'll Be Gone (Frerard)

After the death of someone truly important to him, Gerard is left lonely and depressed, wondering whether or not it's worth it to keep living. One day however, Gerard meets Frank, who happens to fall out of a tree while Gerard is walking to school and nearly crushes him. The two get along quite well, even though their...

Completed

Wasted Time (Frerard)

[this story is triggering it involves: suicide, self harm, and cringy af sorry] Frank Iero is starting at a new school in high school, doesn't that suck. He quickly makes a new friend Gerard Way and becomes one of the "homosexual emo fags" of the school along with Gerard. Soon enough as school passes by they become cl...

Completed

Fool (Frerard fanfiction)

Frank, the new kid at school, is trouble. He's already been kicked out of two high schools, and has problems relating to others. So far, he has only befriended Rye, a kind, funny and sweet girl who showed him around the first day, her boyfriend Aidan, and her best friend J, who has made an effort to get him friends...

Completed

School Isn't so Bad if You're Here»Frerard

[FRERARD] On the second day of eleventh grade, Frank Iero meets a strange boy named Gerard. They hit it off and soon become best friends. Well, maybe more than friends...

You First

Gerard Way is a quiet kid at school. yet he has his own secrets(of him being a homosexual). But all changes when someone finds out He and his brother disagree about a lot of stuff. That is what drives this emo crazy. then he meets someone who he thought he loved Him and his bestfriend go through rough times sticking...
